timeline.author: JulianKniephoff
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -51,6 +53,15 @@
   title = "Configurable Player Endpoint",
   abstractText = "This service redirects to configured players.",
   notes = {})
+@Component(
+  immediate = true,
+  service = PlayerRedirect.class,
+  property = {
+    "service.description=Configurable Player Endpoint",
+    "opencast.service.type=org.opencastproject.engage.ui.player.redirect",
+    "opencast.service.path=/play"
+  }
+)

replies.bodyText: If you want it, you get it. Fixed.
replies.author: lkiesow

timeline.message:
OSGi Annotations for Engage UI

This patch switches to OSGi annotations for the component definition in
the engage-ui module.

OSGi Annotations for Engage UI

This patch switches to OSGi annotations for the component definition in
the engage-ui module.
